description:
“I feel like this is a first date,” Miles admitted as he tied the line around the tree. “I'm a little nervous.”
Ashton was watching, his shirt off. “Can I help with anything?”
“I’ve just about got it,” Miles said. And then he did something amazing... he jumped on the line suspended a few feet above the ground and started tightrope walking!
“Wow!“ Ashton said, wide eyed. “How long have you been doing this?”
“On and off for about three years,” Miles replied, being careful to keep his balance.
Of course, Miles wanted Ashton to take his turn. He helped him up onto the rope.
“This is a good excuse to get my hands on you!” he said.
I could tell that Miles really liked Ashton. Once we got back the house, he couldn’t wait to fuck him!
There were a few times while we were filming that Ashton had to jump off of Miles and take a break.
“What happened?” I asked.
“He was nailing my sweet spot,” Ashton said. “He almost got a load of cum on his face!”
title: Miles & Ashton: Bareback
